bakery.name: Bakery
bakery.imgAlt: Vector image of a bakery. The walls are orange, with a dark green canopy. The over head sign is golden, it reads Bakery. On top of the bakery there is a sculpture of a loaf of bread.

cafe.name: Cafe
cafe.imgAlt: Vector image of a coffe shop. The walls are bright yellow. The over head sign is a brown coffee colour, it reads Cafe. On top of the cafe there is a sculpture of a cup of coffee.
